title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
EB: The CVS repository view is no longer maximized after switching perspectives. It should remain maximized.
SR:
1. Open the CVS repository view.
2. Maximize the view.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Verify that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
